meaningMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 感慨 meaning "strong feelings" and 深い meaning "deep." Something that makes you feel strong emotions deep down inside is <vocabulary>deeply moving</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a combination of a jukugo word and an i-adjective. You've learned both of them so just mash them together, with the rendaku making ふ to ぶ, and you've got the reading down pat!
